subject: New enthusiast again...
msgSnippet: Hello, Ted!  Thanks for the offer of the other Read group.  I probably will join it when I am further along.  At the moment, I only know a few letters of the
messageBody:
Hello, Ted! Thanks for the offer of the other Read group. I probably
will join it when I am further along. At the moment, I only know a
few letters of the alphabet. I am not in a position to catch my own
mistakes, which is why I hope to find someone in the same situation
who wants an elementary learning partner. We could go on to reading
and writing once we learn the basic rules and letters....

By the way, is anybody in contact with English departments of schools
and colleges about this system of representing spoken English?
